name: Jobe Armor Tier 3 ( Chosen / Faithfull )
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a part of Jobe Armor QL 220 ( #L "see here" "/tell recipe 58" and #L "here" "/tell recipe 56" ) a Blue Glyph ( ie : #L "Blue Glyph of Enel" "218349" ) #L "Finely Refined Notum" "227643" a sided Insigna #L "Insignia of the Faithful" "229043" or #L "Insignia of the Chosen" "229047" ) ------------------------------ First ------------------------------ Upgrade your Jobe Armor to QL220. If it's Tier 2 part, right-click on it. If it's a Tier 1 part, you have to find a #L "Glyph of the Arcana" "227911" and use it on Advanced Jobe Suit part. Example: #L "Advanced Jobe Suit Support System" "227906" + #L "Glyph of the Arcana" "227911" = #L "Excellent Jobe Suit Support System" "227909" WARNING : Back Part for MetaPhysistis, Doctor, Soldier and Adventurer are the same. Once you apply the Glyph of the Arcana on it, you have to right-click the Excellent Jobe Suit Support System to turn it into your profession before continuing. ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Blue Glyph + Finely Refined Notum = Blue Glyph - Revived ( ie #L "Blue Glyph of Aban - Revived" "227702" ) Skills: | QP1210,CL1210 | ------------------------------ Blue Glyph - Revived + Sided Insigna = Sided Glyph ( ie #L "Water Glyph of Judgement" "229049" ) Skills: | QFT1375,EE1375 | ------------------------------ Sided Glyph + Jobe Armor QL220 = Sided Tier 3 Armor ( ie #L "Chosen Nano Technician Boots" "214795" ) Skills: | PS?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ Omni: #L "Insignia of the Chosen" "229047" Clan: #L "Insignia of the Faithful" "229043" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ You have now fully ugraded your Jobe armor... congratulations!
